title: Coronavirus: Australian scientists begin tests of potential vaccines
content:
Scientists in Australia have begun testing two potential coronavirus vaccines in "milestone" lab trials.
The vaccines, made by Oxford University and US company Inovio Pharmaceutical, have been cleared for animal testing by the World Health Organization.

Covid-19: Markaz attendees are hiding, says Maharashtra home ministry
content: The Maharashtra home ministry said around 50-60 Markaz attendees are trying to hide and their mobile phones are switched off. The police are trying to locate them across the state. title: Top Places to visit in Achhnera, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Achhnera is a town and a municipal board in Agra district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
Geography
Achhnera is located at 27.18°N 77.77°E. It has an average elevation of 167 meters (547 feet). It is famous for its cultural values; people of different religions live

title: Top Places to visit in Adalaj, Gujarat
content:
Adalaj is a census town in Gandhinagar district in the Indian state of Gujarat.
 
Geography
Adalaj is located at 23.17°N 72.58°E. It has an average elevation of 68 metres (223 ft).

Top Places to visit in Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh
content: Amaravati is the state capital of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, and the primary city of the state's Capital Region. title: Top Places to visit in Anakapalle, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Anakapalle is a suburb of Visakhapatnam in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The municipality was merged with Greater Visakhapatnam Municipal Corporation. It has the second largest jaggery market of the country.

title: Top Places to visit in Attili, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Attili is a village in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It belongs to Tanuku constituency in Kovvur revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Banaganipalli, Andhra Pradesh
content: Banganapalle or Banagana Palli is a town in the state of Andhra Pradesh, India. It lies in Kurnool district, 70 km south of the town of Kurnool. title: Top Places to visit in Bapatla, Andhra Pradesh
content: Bapatla is a town in Guntur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the mandal headquarters of Bapatla mandal of Tenali revenue division. The nearest towns and cities to Bapatla are Tenali ,Guntur, Chirala and Ponnur of 51km ,61km, 17km, and 22km respectively.&nbs

title: Top Places to visit in Bheemunipatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Bheemunipatnam (also known as Bheemili), is a suburb in the city of Visakhapatnam, India. The town was named after Bhima a character in the Hindu epic Mahabharata.
